text: Eva Son-Forget (born 15 April 1983), previously known as Joachim Son-Forget (pronounced "son-for-zhay"), is a South Korean-born, French politician. From 2017 to 2022, she was a member of the National Assembly. In February 2020, Son-Forget announced her candidacy for President of France in the 2022 election. However, she later dropped out and supported Ã‰ric Zemmour's unsuccessful campaign. In November 2024, she announced being a transgender woman and changed her first name to Eva. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Haute-Marne
title: Eva Son-Forget
